Start.Speaker: C1
Start.Content: Hey, they finally brought the pizza in for our group!

2.Speaker: C2
2.Content: Yea, but I don't really feel too hungry.

3.Speaker: C1
3.Content: If you want, we can all go somewhere else instead.

5.Speaker: C1
5.Content: I heard that they recently open a new Giordanos on Halsted. If you want, you can join us.

6.Speaker: C2
6.Content: I think I'll just head home instead.

7.Speaker: System
7.Content: You never spoke to that person again. YOU LOSE.
